original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par @346b shes pa ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo /🔽de bzhin du skye mched 'di dag ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par @346b shes pa ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo / de bzhin du skye mched 'di dag ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo //
translated: Likewise, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are empty of self and what belongs to self.🔽Likewise, these sense-spheres are empty of self and what belongs to self.

original: de bzhin du khams rnams ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo //🔽kye phung po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du khams rnams ni bdag dang / bdag gis stong ngo // kye phung po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu nas /
translated: Likewise, the elements are empty of self and what belongs to self.

original: sprul pa'i bar lta bu'o //🔽skye mched de dag ni rmi lam lta bu nas /
analyzed: sprul pa'i bar lta bu'o // skye mched de dag ni rmi lam lta bu nas /
translated: “Oh! The aggregates are like a dream, up to like an emanation.

original: sprul pa'i bar lta bu'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i bar lta bu'o //
translated: These sense-spheres are like a dream, up to like an emanation.

original: khams 'di dag ni sprul pa'i bar dag lta bu ste /
analyzed: khams 'di dag ni sprul pa'i bar dag lta bu ste /
translated: These elements are like an emanation.

original: kye 'di dag la phung po dang; khams dang / skye mched ni ci'ang med do //🔽'di la rmi lam mam /
analyzed: kye 'di dag la phung po dang; khams dang / skye mched ni ci'ang med do // 'di la rmi lam mam /
translated: Oh! In these there are no aggregates, elements, or sense-spheres at all.🔽Here there is no dream or🔽one who dreams.

original: rmi lam rmi ba po 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: rmi lam rmi ba po 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no echo or

original: brag ca'am / brag ca nyan pa po'am /🔽mig yor ram /
analyzed: brag ca'am / brag ca nyan pa po'am / mig yor ram /
translated: one who hears the echo.

original: mig yor mthong ba pa'am /
analyzed: mig yor mthong ba pa'am /
translated: There is no optical aberration or🔽one who sees the optical aberration.

original: de bzhin du smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa mthong ba po'ang med de /
analyzed: de bzhin du smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma dang / sprul pa mthong ba po'ang med de /
translated: Likewise, there is no one who sees a mirage, an illusion, or a magical creation.

original: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na /
translated: All phenomena are unreal and have the nature of unreality.

original: khyed ni phung po med pa la phung por 'du shes par 'gyur /
analyzed: khyed ni phung po med pa la phung por 'du shes par 'gyur /
translated: You have the notion of aggregates where there are no aggregates.

original: khams med pa la khams su 'du shes pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes par zad do //
analyzed: khams med pa la khams su 'du shes pa dang / skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes par zad do //
translated: You have the notion of elements where there are no elements, and the notion of sense sources where there are no sense sources.

original: chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci log las skyes pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su zin pa yin na /
analyzed: chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci log las skyes pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su zin pa yin na /
translated: All these phenomena arise from error in dependence on conditions, and are subject to the ripening of karma.

original: 'di la khyed dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos por 'du shes pa'i rgyu gzhan gang yin zhes ston par byed cing /
analyzed: 'di la khyed dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos por 'du shes pa'i rgyu gzhan gang yin zhes ston par byed cing /
translated: What other cause do you have for the notion of reality in regard to unreal phenomena?”

original: sems can ser sna can gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
analyzed: sems can ser sna can gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
translated: “Those sentient beings who are stingy

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa des ser sna de las bzlog nas /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol @347a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa des ser sna de las bzlog nas / sbyin pa'i pha rol @347a *//
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattva, through that skillful means, turns them away from stinginess,

original: tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed do //
translated: and connects them to the perfection of generosity.

original: sems can de dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de'ang longs spyod chen po nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can de dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de'ang longs spyod chen po nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: That generosity of those sentient beings becomes great enjoyment.

original: de las kyang bzlog nas /
analyzed: de las kyang bzlog nas /
translated: Turning them away from that,

original: tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed do //
translated: he connects them to morality.

original: de dag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba de'ang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba de'ang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That taking up of morality by them becomes rebirth in the higher realms.
